title: 关于Skript扩展GUI界面的问题
author: 幽冥冥
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Ghost灬幽冥 于 2018-12-23 16:15 编辑 

我的菜单是这样写的：
on chat:
        if message is "菜单" or "副本":
                cancel event
                open chest with 5 rows named "&f[ &c系统 &f] &c快捷菜单" to player
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 0 of player with glowing orange_stained_glass_pane with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 8 of player with glowing orange_stained_glass_pane with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 1 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 7 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 9 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 17 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 2 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 6 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 18 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 26 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 35 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 3 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 5 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 27 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 4 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 36 of player with glowing orange_stained_glass_pane with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 44 of player with glowing orange_stained_glass_pane with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 37 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 43 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 38 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 42 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 39 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                format slot 41 of player with glowing gray glass with lore "&f&n我只是一块玻璃" named " " to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 40 of player with glowing blue_stained_glass_pane with lore "&f&n2017年5月6日20:53:37完成" named "&c&l菜单" to run [execute player command  "/b"]
                wait 3 ticks
                format slot 20 of player with glowing hopper minecart with lore "&f&n点击回城" named "&a&l* &f&n回城" to run [execute player command  "spawn"]
                format slot 22 of player with glowing end portal frame with lore "&f&n点击打开点卷商店" named "&a&l* &f&n点卷商城" to run [execute player command  "tmenu open 点券商城"]
                format slot 24 of player with glowing feather with lore "&f&n点击打开VIP翅膀" named "&a&l* &f&nVIP翅膀" to run [execute player command  "/cb"]复制代码期间有wait的操作，形成了动态的加载菜单物品
昨天晚上还好好的没什么问题，快速关闭或是没加载完全就关闭不会物品继续加载到背包今早开服，只要是打开菜单快速关闭或是没加载完全就关闭，剩下加载的物品会自动输入到玩家背包中
就像这样↓↓↓
